name: INPersonRelationship
desc: Constants indicating the relationship between the current user and another person.

items.name: static let assistant: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is an assistant to the current user.

items.name: static let brother: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is the brother of the current user.

items.name: static let child: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is a child of the current user.

items.name: static let father: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is the father of the current user.

items.name: static let friend: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is a friend of the current user.

items.name: static let manager: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is the manager of the current user.

items.name: static let mother: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is the mother of the current user.

items.name: static let parent: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is a parent of the current user.

items.name: static let partner: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is the partner of the current user.

items.name: static let sister: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is the sister of the current user.

items.name: static let spouse: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is the spouse of the current user.

items.name: static let daughter: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is the daughter of the current user.

items.name: static let son: INPersonRelationship
items.desc: The person is the son of the current user.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a person relationship type with the specified raw value.
